name: Ursa
title: Ulfsaar
lore: A fierce warrior who fights to protect his cubs, Ursa's fury makes him stronger with each strike.

earthshock.name: Earthshock
earthshock.description: Ursa slams the ground, damaging and slowing enemies in front of him.

overpower.name: Overpower
overpower.description: Ursa attacks with maximum attack speed for a number of attacks.

furySwipes.name: Fury Swipes
furySwipes.description: Each consecutive attack on the same target deals increasing bonus damage.

enrage.name: Enrage
enrage.description: Ursa goes into a rage, multiplying Fury Swipes damage and gaining status resistance.
